issues.title: Page should contain a level-one heading
issues.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

issues.title: Elements with visible text labels do not have matching accessible names.
issues.description: Visible text labels that do not match the accessible name can result in a confusing experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about accessible names](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/label-content-name-mismatch).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Text inside the element is not included in the accessible name
